oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena

Class InferenceMaintenanceMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.InferenceMaintenanceMode

  • public class InferenceMaintenanceMode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class specifies the mode of maintaining rules index (entailment). An instance of this class can be specified as an optional parameter during creation of an Attachment object. Two inference maintenance modes are specified.

    Because inference is considered a time-consuming process, we do not have an inference maintenance mode that demands an inference update when there is any incremental changes to a GraphOracleSem instance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static InferenceMaintenanceMode NO_UPDATE
      A constant denoting that no automatic inference maintenance will be carried out.
      static InferenceMaintenanceMode UPDATE_WHEN_COMMIT
      A constant denoting that inference maintenance will be done automatically when commitTransaction() is invoked.

    • Field Detail

      • NO_UPDATE

        public static final InferenceMaintenanceMode NO_UPDATE
        A constant denoting that no automatic inference maintenance will be carried out. To update inference, you must manually invoke performInference() after some changes (triple addtions or removals) have been made to an instance of GraphOracleSem.

      • UPDATE_WHEN_COMMIT

        public static final InferenceMaintenanceMode UPDATE_WHEN_COMMIT
        A constant denoting that inference maintenance will be done automatically when commitTransaction() is invoked.

      • updateWhenCommit

        public boolean updateWhenCommit()
        Returns TRUE if inference needs to be maintained when COMMIT is invoked on a GraphOracleSem object.
